items.title: 1. There is no greater good, do good today
items.text: All the worst crimes in the world have been done because of someone justifying it as it's for the greater good.

items.title: 2. Give more than you take
items.text: This applies to business, freelancing, love and every aspect of life. By doing this there's no way you cannot succeed

items.title: 3. There is no talent, everything is a skill
items.text: You can learn anything if you care enough and practice hard enough

items.title: 4. Have that dawg in you
items.text: You think you have a skill issue but you just ain't got that dawg in you

items.title: 5. See things as they are.
items.text: There is no need to dive deeper or find complex reasoning. Face value meanings are great. Closure is unnecessary

items.title: 6. Nobody is self-made
items.text: You were literally created by your parents and you owe everything to your teachers, friends, family.
